name: search_source_content
description: Search for relevant content from non-CSV sources to add context to the report. Use this to find supporting information from documents, notes, or other text sources that can enrich the report with qualitative insights.

source_id.description: The source_id of the non-CSV source to search (from context_source_ids)

search_query.description: What information to search for in this source. Be specific about the type of context needed.

section_context.description: Which section of the report this context is for
